participant_abstract.sent: Abby did a good job of getting things going by asking everyone to draw their favorite animal on the board and then took qualities form those animals to be put into the product design.
We decided we want a water-resistant, sturdy and tactile remote contol.
In terms of the important functions, everyone expressed a desire to have a 'remote-finder' device.
It should be cool to design the best way for someone to find the remote (a sound, vibrations, light or base to hold it when its not being used were discussed).
We also discussed the remote not having too many buttons and perhaps a small screen which might reduce the number of buttons.
